Players also have the option to choose an Origin at the start of Character Creation if they don't prefer to make a custom build. Origin Characters are pre-designed characters that are selected during Character Creation where players can step into the shoes of these pre-made characters and start their adventure. Origin Characters for Baldur's Gate 3 are equipped with stats, unique personal backstories, exclusive quests, motivations
